title: Course for Improving Self-Directed Learning Readiness and Information-Sharing Attitudes

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic learning strategies and acquisition of job-related scientific knowledge
context.additional_context: Targeting science sector managers/leaders, this program aims to strengthen self-directed learning competencies and foster knowledge-sharing cultures within organizations. Conducts practice-centered education using VR simulations in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose their learning tendencies and develop improvement plans using the Self-Directed Learning Readiness (SDLR) survey tool.
Learners design knowledge diffusion strategies within organizations by experiencing information-sharing scenarios in a VR simulation environment.
Learners analyze information-sharing motivations (e.g., peer support, task efficiency) through collaborative activities with peers and propose actionable sharing solutions.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
